Title: Gas mispricing in cosmwasm-vm
Description:
**Component:** wasmvm
**Criticality:** Medium ([ACMv1](https://github.com/interchainio/security/blob/main/resources/CLASSIFICATION_MATRIX.md): I:Moderate; L:Likely)
**Patched versions:** wasmvm 1.5.3, 2.0.2, 2.1.1
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.0.2, all versions starting from 2.1.0 before 2.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.2 before 2.1.0, all versions starting from 2.1.1
